name: needs-triage
description: applied to all new customer/user issues. Removed after triage occurs

name: blocked
description: indicates there are blocking issues that need to be addressed before progress can be made

name: p0
description: This issue is critical and should be worked on immediately. (fixed in days/weeks)

name: p1
description: Very important and will be addressed within the team planning window (weeks/months)

name: p2
description: This issue we intend to address but we have can live without it (fixed in months/quarters)

name: cgr
description: chainguard container repository

name: images
description: chainguard images wolfi OS and packaging tools

name: enforce
description: chainguard enforce platform

name: sig-aas
description: sigstore as a service

name: edu
description: chainguard education and documentation team

name: devx
description: developer experience advocacy and open source team

name: security
description: a security sensitive issue

name: cve
description: known vulnerability detected

name: on-duty
description: issues that should be handled during an on-duty shift

name: incident
description: production incident handled by on-call

name: post-mortem
description: post-mortem related issues and PRs

name: request-version-update
description: request for a newer version of a package

name: roadmap
description: used by teams to indicate issues that we want to represent in a roadmap view for sales/product

name: image-request
description: tag for new chainguard image requests

name: wolfi-package-request
description: used to track requests for new wolfi packages
